Name: actualValueLabel
Description: If set, displays a specified label instead of the numeric actual value.

Name: deltaValueLabel
Description: If set, displays a specified label instead of the calculated numeric delta value.

Name: maxValue
Description: If set, defines the right scale value for the bar chart.

Name: minValue
Description: If set, defines the left scale value for the bar chart.

Name: mode
Description: Specifies whether to display the actual value itself or delta between the actual value and the target value. If not set, the default mode displays the actual value.

Name: showActualValue
Description: If set to true, shows numeric actual value. This property only works in Actual mode.

Name: showDeltaValue
Description: If set to true, shows the calculated delta value instead of the numeric actual value regardless of the showActualValue setting. This property works only in the Delta mode.

Name: showTargetValue
Description: If set to true, shows numeric target value.

Name: showValueMarker
Description: If set to true, shows the value marker.

Name: size
Description: Updates the size of the chart. If not set then the default size is applied based on the device tile.

Name: targetValueLabel
Description: If set, displays a specified label instead of the numeric target value.

Name: width
Description: The width of the chart. If it is not set, the size of the control is defined by the size property.
